CSSMathSum.summary: The CSSMathSum interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents the result obtained by calling , , or on .

remarks.para: A CSSMathSum is the object type returned when the StylePropertyMapReadOnly.get() method is used on a CSS property whose value is created with a calc() function.

CSSMathSumCSSMathSum.summary:
NOTE Experimental The CSSMathSum() constructor creates a
new object which creates a new
object which represents the result obtained by calling
, ,
or on .

CSSMathSumValues.summary:
The CSSMathSum.values read-only property
of the interface returns a
object which contains one or more objects.
